verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is nothing that I need
That he won’t supply
There is nothing that I need
That he won’t provide
Because I believe, yes I believe
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And so I say to the mountain
Move
And so I say to the mountain
Get out of my way.
(Repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Because I believe
Yes I believe
